thread.section_title: Elevate Styles Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Elevate Styles | elevatestyles.com
thread.title: KP

author: KP
title: KP
text: Ordered some straight weave on the bogo sale the pricing was amazing. I live in the islands and buying a pack of hair is ridiculously expensive I sent 35 for two pack of hair and grateful. I order hair Saturday night received hair on Thursday, hair install on the following Saturday. Hair feels amazing very light and soft and took the hot iron great. Was a little skeptical with the hair because some say 100% human hair and still have blend this one didn't. I paid $10 for shipping which wasn't to bad. Another company was charging me $23 to ship. Will order again
